      This function gets user details for users that have been retweeted by a given user If users are found, details are stored in a list of hashmaps and returned

      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> DatabaseConnector.showUser(java.lang.String username)
      This function takes a username and performs a lookup in the database If a user is found, details are stored in a hashmap and returned
